entry.title: Log of dreams
entry.summary: I want to register the dreams I remember when I wake up.
entry.content:
The green bike

Saturday, February 8, 2020

I went to play basketball to the park of Macultepec, meanwhile, I was going there, I was thinking that maybe I should watch some basketball videos on Youtube to learn to play better.

When I was already playing, I threw the ball to some bikes parked in the corner, accidentally I hit one green color bike, which felt to the ground; some guys came to see what's going on, among them, a girl, who was precisely the owner of the green bike... I told her that I was interested in MTB, she told me that they knew some routes, but not precisely MTB routes...

She asked me about my phone number to stay in contact and go to some rides together, I think the other guys were her brothers... I was trying to remember my phone number from Germany, to impress her, but I couldn't, then I woke up.

So, I will buy a basket ball today.
